text: Could Demi Lovato be collaborating with one of the Latin industry ’ s biggest stars — Luis Fonsi? The Disney Channel alum recently revealed that she was working on a Spanish - language project. She told Buzzfeed, “ You will have to wait and find out because I recorded something recently that I think you will like. ” Earlier this week, Luis and Demi fueled rumors that they've teamed up for a project after exchanging messages on Instagram. The 25 - year - old shared a photo of herself getting ready to shoot a music video, which Luis commented on in Spanish writing, “ What ’ s up Demi... ” The Confident singer later commented on a photo of Luis wrapping a video on set writing, “ Hi Fonsi..... ” C
